languages.text: {n}Юный Гапрак церемонно кланяется.{/n} "Род Гапрак счастлив преподнести вам это благословенное творение кузнецов {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. Пусть эта локационная матрица, на сотворение которой ушла целая жизнь священного ремесленника, всегда указывает вам верный путь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Юный Гапрак церемонно кланяется.{/n} "Род Гапрак счастлив преподнести вам это благословенное творение кузнецов Омниссии. Пусть эта локационная матрица, на сотворение которой ушла целая жизнь священного ремесленника, всегда указывает вам верный путь".

languages.text: {n}Young Gaprak bows ceremoniously.{/n} "House Gaprak is delighted to present you this blessed work of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s smiths. May this locator matrix, which took the holy artisan an entire lifetime to create, always show you the right path."
languages.original_text: {n}Юный Гапрак церемонно кланяется.{/n} "Род Гапрак счастлив преподнести вам это благословенное творение кузнецов {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. Пусть эта локационная матрица, на сотворение которой ушла целая жизнь священного ремесленника, всегда указывает вам верный путь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Young Gaprak bows ceremoniously.{/n} "House Gaprak is delighted to present you this blessed work of the Omnissiah's smiths. May this locator matrix, which took the holy artisan their whole life to create, always show you the right path."

{n}Young Gaprak bows ceremoniously.{/n} "House Gaprak is delighted to present you this blessed work of the Omnissiah's smiths. May this locator matrix, which took the holy artisan their whole life to create, always show you the right path."

{n}Young Gaprak bows ceremoniously.{/n} "House Gaprak is delighted to present you this blessed work of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s smiths. May this locator matrix, which took the holy artisan an entire lifetime to create, always show you the right path."

{n}Young Gaprak bows ceremoniously.{/n} "House Gaprak is delighted to present you this blessed work of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s smiths. May this locator matrix, which took the holy artisan an entire lifetime to create, always show you the right path."

{n}Young Gaprak bows ceremoniously.{/n} "House Gaprak is delighted to present you this blessed work of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s smiths. May this locator matrix, which took the holy artisan an entire lifetime to create, always show you the right path."

languages.text: {n}ヤング・ギャプラックは厳かなお辞儀をする。{/n}「ギャプラック家からはこの、{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の鍛冶師による神聖な作品を献上します。こちらの探知マトリクスは信仰篤い職人が全生涯をかけて製作したもので、常に正しい道を示すのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Young Gaprak bows ceremoniously.{/n} "House Gaprak is delighted to present you this blessed work of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s smiths. May this locator matrix, which took the holy artisan an entire lifetime to create, always show you the right path."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヤング・ギャプラックは厳かなお辞儀をする。{/n}「ギャプラック家からはこの、{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の鍛冶師による神聖な作品を献上します。こちらの探知マトリクスは信仰篤い職人が全生涯をかけて製作したもので、常に正しい道を示すのです」

languages.text: {n}年轻的贾帕克庄重地鞠了一躬。{/n}“这件受到祝福的礼物，由{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的铁匠们精心制作而成的，是贾帕克家族献给您的礼物。这个定位矩阵耗费了无数神圣工匠的毕生心血，愿它始终为您指明正确的道路。”
languages.original_text: {n}Young Gaprak bows ceremoniously.{/n} "House Gaprak is delighted to present you this blessed work of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s smiths. May this locator matrix, which took the holy artisan an entire lifetime to create, always show you the right path."

traits.locale_text: {n}年轻的贾帕克庄重地鞠了一躬。{/n}“这件受到祝福的礼物，由{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的铁匠们精心制作而成的，是贾帕克家族献给您的礼物。这个定位矩阵耗费了无数神圣工匠的毕生心血，愿它始终为您指明正确的道路。”

languages.text: {n}El joven Gaprak te hace una reverencia.{/n} «La casa Gaprak se alegra de poder entregarle esta obra bendita de los artesanos del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Es nuestro deseo que esta matriz localizadora, que llevó toda una vida crear, siempre le muestre el camino correcto».
languages.original_text: {n}Young Gaprak bows ceremoniously.{/n} "House Gaprak is delighted to present you this blessed work of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s smiths. May this locator matrix, which took the holy artisan an entire lifetime to create, always show you the right path."

traits.locale_text: {n}El joven Gaprak te hace una reverencia.{/n} «La casa Gaprak se alegra de poder entregarle esta obra bendita de los artesanos del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Es nuestro deseo que esta matriz localizadora, que llevó toda una vida crear, siempre le muestre el camino correcto».

languages.text: {n}Le jeune Gaprak s'incline cérémonieusement.{/n} « La maison Gaprak est fière de vous offrir cet appareil béni conçu par les forgerons de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. Puisse cette matrice localisatrice, œuvre de toute une vie, toujours vous montrer le droit chemin. »
languages.original_text: {n}Young Gaprak bows ceremoniously.{/n} "House Gaprak is delighted to present you this blessed work of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s smiths. May this locator matrix, which took the holy artisan an entire lifetime to create, always show you the right path."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le jeune Gaprak s'incline cérémonieusement.{/n} « La maison Gaprak est fière de vous offrir cet appareil béni conçu par les forgerons de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. Puisse cette matrice localisatrice, œuvre de toute une vie, toujours vous montrer le droit chemin. »

languages.text: {n}Der junge Gaprak verbeugt sich feierlich.{/n} "Das Haus Gaprak überreicht Euch voller Freude diese gesegnete Arbeit der Schmiede des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Möge diese Ortungsmatrix, an der der heilige Handwerker ein ganzes Leben gearbeitet hat, Euch stets den richtigen Weg weisen."
languages.original_text: {n}Young Gaprak bows ceremoniously.{/n} "House Gaprak is delighted to present you this blessed work of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s smiths. May this locator matrix, which took the holy artisan an entire lifetime to create, always show you the right path."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der junge Gaprak verbeugt sich feierlich.{/n} "Das Haus Gaprak überreicht Euch voller Freude diese gesegnete Arbeit der Schmiede des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Möge diese Ortungsmatrix, an der der heilige Handwerker ein ganzes Leben gearbeitet hat, Euch stets den richtigen Weg weisen."

languages.text: {n}Genç Gaprak, son derece resmî bir şekilde eğilerek selam veriyor.{/n} "Gaprak Hanesi, {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'in{/g} ustalarından birinin bu kutsal eserini size armağan etmekten memnuniyet duyar. Dileriz ki aziz zanaatkârın bir ömürlük emekle ürettiği bu konumlayıcı matrisi, size daima doğru yolu gösterir."
languages.original_text: {n}Young Gaprak bows ceremoniously.{/n} "House Gaprak is delighted to present you this blessed work of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s smiths. May this locator matrix, which took the holy artisan an entire lifetime to create, always show you the right path."

traits.locale_text: {n}Genç Gaprak, son derece resmî bir şekilde eğilerek selamlıyor.{/n} "Gaprak Hanesi, {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}'in ustalarından birinin bu kutsal eserini size memnuniyetle armağan etmek istiyor. Dileriz ki o aziz zanaatkârın ömrü boyunca çalışarak ürettiği bu konumlayıcı matrisi, size daima doğru yolu gösterir."
